contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Italian comune | name = Zignago | official_name = Comune di Zignago | native_name = | image_skyline = Zignago-IMG 1684.JPG | image_caption = Zignago | image_shield = Zignago-Stemma.png | shield_alt = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | latd = 44 |latm = 17 |lats = |latNS = N | longd = 9 |longm = 45 |longs = |longEW = E | coordinates_type = type:city(506)_region:IT | coordinates_display = title | coordinates_footnotes = | region = [[Liguria]] | province = [[Province of La Spezia]] (SP) | frazioni = | mayor_party = | mayor = Roberto Valletti | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 27.8 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 506 | population_as_of = Dec. 2004 | pop_density_footnotes = | population_demonym = Zignaghesi | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | twin1 = | twin1_country = | saint = | day = | postal_code = 19020 | area_code = 0187 | website = | footnotes = }} '''Zignago''' is a ''[[comune]]'' (municipality) in the [[Province of La Spezia]] in the [[Italy|Italian]] region [[Liguria]], located about 70 km east of [[Genoa]] and about 20 km north of [[La Spezia]]. As of 31 December 2004, it had a population of 506 and an area of 27.8 kmÂ².<ref name="istat">All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute [[National Institute of Statistics (Italy)|Istat]].</ref> Zignago borders the following municipalities: [[Brugnato]], [[Rocchetta di Vara]], [[Sesta Godano]], [[Zeri]]. == Demographic evolution == <timeline> Colors= id:lightgrey value:gray(0.9) id:darkgrey value:gray(0.8) id:sfondo value:rgb(1,1,1) id:barra value:rgb(0.6,0.7,0.8) ImageSize = width:455 height:303 PlotArea = left:50 bottom:50 top:30 right:30 DateFormat = x.y
